article_title: What words were used most in Sam Brownback's State of the State speech?
article_text:
What words were used most in Sam Brownback's State of the State speech?

'Kansas' used most at 31; 'ObamaCare' used six times and 'budget' spoken just once

og.description: Here's the word count, via wordclouds.com, from the official transcript of Tuesday night's State of the State speech given by Gov. Sam Brownback at the Capitol.
og.title: What words were used most in Sam Brownback's State of the State speech?

article_metadata.description: Here’s the word count, via wordclouds.com, from the official transcript of Tuesday night’s State of the State speech given by Gov. Sam Brownback at the Capitol. The number of times the word is used is on the left and the word spoken during the speech is on the right.Click here to view the complete transcript of the speech. 31 Kansas17 people15 Kansans12 state11 year11 can10 work10 must9 working9 better

article_summary:
What words were used most in Sam Brownback's State of the State speech?
'Kansas' used most at 31; 'ObamaCare' used six times and 'budget' spoken just once
